product_name: Deuter OnTop ABS 30 Avalanche Airbag Pack
long_description: Ideal for half-day backcountry tours and full-day epics, the OnTop ABS 20 Avalanche Airbag Pack unites safety and comfort with the ABS airbag system and Deuter Alpine Back System.
short_description: Ideal for half-day backcountry tours and full-day epics, the OnTop ABS 20 Avalanche Airbag Pack unites safety and comfort with the ABS airbag system and Deuter Alpine Back System.
